'''FileHippo''' is an [[internet]] [[download]] [[website]]. It offers [[freeware]] as well as [[shareware]] programs, but does not accept user uploaded files unlike sites like [[MegaUpload]], and [[Rapidshare]]. It also offers the FileHippo Update Checker, a small program that scans your computer for installed software from the FileHippo site and suggests available updates for it.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.filehippo.com/updatechecker|title=Update Checker|publisher=FileHippo|accessdate=2009-06-13}}</ref> According to [[Quantcast]], it receives more than three million [[USA|US]] visitors each month and as of March 2010, [[Alexa Internet|Alexa]] lists filehippo in the top 1000 most visited websites.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.quantcast.com/filehippo.com|title=FileHippo Quantcast Profile|publisher=Quantcast|accessdate=2009-06-13}}</ref> <ref>{{cite web|url =http://www.alexa.com/siteinfo/www.filehippo.com/|title=FileHippo on Alexa|accessdate=2009-06-23}}</ref>
+
'''FileHippo''' is an [[internet]] [[download]] [[website]]. It offers [[freeware]] as well as [[shareware]] programs, but does not accept user uploaded files<ref>http://www.filehippo.com/info/about/</ref>. It also offers the FileHippo Update Checker, a small program that scans your computer for installed software from the FileHippo site and suggests available updates for it.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.filehippo.com/updatechecker|title=Update Checker|publisher=FileHippo|accessdate=2009-06-13}}</ref> According to [[Quantcast]], it receives more than three million [[USA|US]] visitors each month and as of March 2010, [[Alexa Internet|Alexa]] lists filehippo in the top 1000 most visited websites.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.quantcast.com/filehippo.com|title=FileHippo Quantcast Profile|publisher=Quantcast|accessdate=2009-06-13}}</ref> <ref>{{cite web|url =http://www.alexa.com/siteinfo/www.filehippo.com/|title=FileHippo on Alexa|accessdate=2009-06-23}}</ref>
